name: Sacred Flame
ability:
Deploy: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on each side of this card.
Order: Boost all allied Firesworn units by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on each side of this card. Order: Boost all allied Firesworn units by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Do you feel it? I sense something else beyond its warmth, something more...

name: Lieutenant von Herst
ability:
At the end of your turn, if you control a Cleric, Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on this row.
Fee 1: Transform a Firesworn Zealot into a Flaming Rose Footman.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, if you control a Cleric, Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on this row. Fee 1: Transform a Firesworn Zealot into a Flaming Rose Footman.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
flavor: The fall of the Order wasn’t so hard for him like for the others. He is still required to count the goods and manage supplies, only now it has become even easier… Less strict at least.

name: Ludovicus Brunenbaum
ability:
Timer 3: Gain 9 Coins.
Tribute 5: Gain 9 Coins immediately instead.
ability_html: Timer 3: Gain 9 Coins. Tribute 5: Gain 9 Coins immediately instead.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
flavor: They say he'd sell his own mother. But no one was buying.

name: Procession of Penance
ability: Deploy: Damage self by 10. Reduce the damage by 2 for each Firesworn Token you control.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage self by 10. Reduce the damage by 2 for each Firesworn Token you control.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Careful not to stand too close. Got blood splattered on me favorite tunic last time.

name: Roderick de Wett
ability:
Veil.
Zeal. Order (Melee): Spawn a Flaming Rose Footman on this row.
At the end of your turn, if the Order is not used, gain 1 Coin.
ability_html: Veil. Zeal. Order (Melee): Spawn a Flaming Rose Footman on this row. At the end of your turn, if the Order is not used, gain 1 Coin.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
flavor: Count de Wett is exceptionally loathsome and arrogant, but at least he enjoys a little dice poker on the side.

name: Fallen Knight
ability:
Veil.
Intimidate.
Whenever you Spawn a unit on your side of the battlefield, boost self by 1 for each unit Spawned.
ability_html: Veil. Intimidate. Whenever you Spawn a unit on your side of the battlefield, boost self by 1 for each unit Spawned.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Intimidate: Boost self by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a Crime card. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: He abandoned the righteous fight and the flame in him has long gone.

name: Coerced Blacksmith
ability:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Boost an allied unit by 1.
ability_html: Profit 2. Fee 1: Boost an allied unit by 1.
keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
flavor: Do ye prefer a full coin purse or a full set of fingers?

name: Keeper of the Flame
ability:
Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 1.
Tribute 4: Boost all units on this row by 1 instead.
Decrease this card's Tribute cost by 1 for each allied Cleric.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 1. Tribute 4: Boost all units on this row by 1 instead. Decrease this card's Tribute cost by 1 for each allied Cleric.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
flavor: The flame shall forever burn, for evil shall forever corrupt!

name: Firesworn Scribe
ability:
Ranged: Whenever you Spawn one or more units on the battlefield, gain 1 Coin.
Tribute 2: Boost self by 2.
ability_html: Ranged: Whenever you Spawn one or more units on the battlefield, gain 1 Coin. Tribute 2: Boost self by 2.
keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability.
flavor: Wouldn't disturb him if I were you. Those quills are bloody sharp.

name: Cleric of the Flaming Rose
ability:
Profit 3.
Tribute 2: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on this row.
Fee 1: Transform a Firesworn Zealot into a Flaming Rose Footman.
ability_html: Profit 3. Tribute 2: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on this row. Fee 1: Transform a Firesworn Zealot into a Flaming Rose Footman.
keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Tribute: On Deploy, you may choose to spend the specified amount of Coins to trigger this ability. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins.
flavor: We have two eyes, two ears, but only one tongue, so that we would look and listen twice more than we speak.

name: Congregation
ability: Spawn 2 Firesworn Zealots on an allied row. If there is a Firesworn unit on that row, Spawn 3 Firesworn Zealots instead.
ability_html: Spawn 2 Firesworn Zealots on an allied row. If there is a Firesworn unit on that row, Spawn 3 Firesworn Zealots instead.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Our church is not this temple, not our scripture. It is our people, our community, we who have faith.

name: Smuggle
ability:
Profit 3.
Spawn a Flaming Rose Footman on an allied row.
ability_html: Profit 3. Spawn a Flaming Rose Footman on an allied row.
keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Whoever said that the dead are good for nothing? They make for such great smuggle-bags.

name: Tax Collector
ability: Ranged: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Coin.
ability_html: Ranged: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Coin.
keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Coin: The Novigradian underworld's currency of choice for paying Fees and Tributes. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Your Coin-count is reduced by half (rounded down) when carried over into the next round.
flavor: Just between rat catcher and latrine shoveler on this year's most desirable professions list.

name: Eternal Fire Priest
ability: Whenever you Spawn one or more units on the battlefield, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Whenever you Spawn one or more units on the battlefield, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: Closer, my sheep, gather closer. May the Eternal Fire warm your souls!

name: Eternal Fire Disciple
ability:
Profit 2.
Fee 1: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on this row.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Profit 2. Fee 1: Spawn a Firesworn Zealot on this row. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Profit: Gain a specified number of Coins when this card is played. You may possess a maximum of 9 Coins. Fee: Trigger this ability by spending the specified number of Coins. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Look into your hearts, dear brethen. Does a contempt for injustice not burn within it?
